title: Stats object
description: Object that describes the request for Reporting Stats

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

AccountId.title: AccountId
AccountId.description: The Account the Stats are for

OrderId.title: OrderId
OrderId.description: The Order the Stats are for

LineId.title: LineId
LineId.description: The Order Line the Stats are for

ReportStartTime.title: ReportStartTime
ReportStartTime.description: The date report will start. if left blank, it will revert to the LineID start date

ReportEndTime.title: ReportEndTime
ReportEndTime.description: The date report will end. if left blank, it will revert to the LineID end date

ReportFields.description: The fields that are to be included in the Stats report

TimeGranularity.description: The time granularity of the Stats report

ReportFormat.description: requests the rerport output as a Verbose or Non-Verbose data format

Webhook.title: Webhook
Webhook.description: URI of the webhook to respond to
